snippet: U. N. peacekeepers who were detained for possessing Congolese military uniforms apparently bought them to wear while hunting back home, a spokesman for the force said Thursday....

headline.print_headline: UN: Peacekeepers Had Military Uniforms for Own Use
headline.main: UN: Peacekeepers Had Military Uniforms for Own Use

lead_paragraph: U. N. peacekeepers who were detained for possessing Congolese military uniforms apparently bought them to wear while hunting back home, a spokesman for the force said Thursday.
